devdoc.custom:provides-interfaces: IERC721 IERC5192 IERC721ABase IERC721SupplyExtension IERC721MintableExtension IERC721LockableExtension IERC721BurnableExtension IRoyaltyEnforcement

balanceOf(address).details: Returns the number of tokens in `owner`'s account.

burnBatchByFacet(uint256[]).details: Burn from another facet, allow skipping of ownership check as facets are trusted.

burnByFacet(uint256).details: Burn from another facet, allow skipping of ownership check as facets are trusted.

getApproved(uint256).details: Returns the account approved for `tokenId` token. Requirements: - `tokenId` must exist.

isApprovedForAll(address,address).details: Returns if the `operator` is allowed to manage all of the assets of `owner`. See {setApprovalForAll}.

lockByFacet(uint256).details: Locks `amount` of tokens of `account`, of token type `id`. Requirements: - the caller must be diamond itself (other facets).

locked(uint256).details: SBTs assigned to zero address are considered invalid, and queries about them do throw.

maxSupply().details: Maximum amount of tokens possible to exist.

mintByFacet(address,uint256).details: Creates `amount` new tokens for `to`, of token type `id`. See {ERC721A-_mint}. Requirements: - the caller must be diamond itself (other facets).

mintByFacet(address[],uint256).details: Mint constant amount of new tokens for multiple addresses (e.g. 1 nft for each address).

mintByFacet(address[],uint256[]).details: Mint new tokens for multiple addresses with different amounts.

ownerOf(uint256).details: Returns the owner of the `tokenId` token. Requirements: - `tokenId` must exist.

totalSupply().details: Total amount of tokens that exist in the collection.

unlockByFacet(uint256).details: Un-locks `amount` of tokens of `account`, of token type `id`. Requirements: - the caller must be diamond itself (other facets).

devdoc.title: ERC721 (A) - Standard

ApprovalCallerNotOwnerNorApproved().notice: The caller must own the token or be an approved operator.

ApproveToCaller().notice: The caller cannot approve to their own address.

BalanceQueryForZeroAddress().notice: Cannot query the balance for the zero address.

ErrSenderIsNotSelf().notice: The caller must be the current contract itself.

MintERC2309QuantityExceedsLimit().notice: The `quantity` minted with ERC2309 exceeds the safety limit.

MintToZeroAddress().notice: Cannot mint to the zero address.

MintZeroQuantity().notice: The quantity of tokens minted must be more than zero.

OwnershipNotInitializedForExtraData().notice: The `extraData` cannot be set on an unintialized ownership slot.

TransferCallerNotOwnerNorApproved().notice: The caller must own the token or be an approved operator.

TransferFromIncorrectOwner().notice: The token must be owned by `from`.

TransferToNonERC721ReceiverImplementer().notice: Cannot safely transfer to a contract that does not implement the ERC721Receiver interface.

TransferToZeroAddress().notice: Cannot transfer to the zero address.

Locked(uint256).notice: Emitted when the locking status is changed to locked.

Unlocked(uint256).notice: Emitted when the locking status is changed to unlocked.

locked(uint256).notice: Returns the locking status of an Soulbound Token

userdoc.notice: Azuki's implementation of standard EIP-721 NFTs with core capabilities of Royalty, Mintable, Burnable and Lockable.
